content.question: Consider the molecules represented above and the data in the table below. Nonane and 2,3,4-trifluoropentane have almost identical molar masses, but nonane has a significantly higher boiling point. Which of the following statements best helps explain this observation?

choices.label: The C-F is easier to break than the C-H bond.
The C-F is more polar than the C-H bond.
The carbon chains are longer in nonane than they are in 2,3,4-trifluoropentane.
The carbon chains are farther apart in a sample of nonane than they are in 2,3,4-trifluoropentane.

content.answer: The carbon chains are longer in nonane than they are in 2,3,4-trifluoropentane.

skill.text: 6.C: Support a claim with evidence from representations or models at the particulate level, such as the structure of atoms and/or molecules.
